isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - WIPER MOTOR

note.para: The parts that make up the electric wiper motor are not serviceable. The entire wiper motor must be replaced as a unit.

svcprocinfo.para: The wiper motor is part of the windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2, Figure 87) or (Item 2, Figure 88) or (Item 2, Figure 89) mounted on the engine side of the cowl under the cowl tray and engine air duct inlet assembly.

svcsubproc.title: Install Wiper Motor on Vehicles before 2002 Engines and after 2002 Engines before January 2005
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 90 for Items in parentheses.

note.para: Before installing the windshield wiper motor (Item 8) onto the windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) make sure it is in the "PARKED" or "OFF" position.

step1.para: With windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) on a clean, dry work surface, position windshield wiper motor (Item 8) onto windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly and install three hex bolts (Item 7) through windshield wiper motor mounting plate of windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) into windshield wiper motor (Item 8). Tighten hex bolts to 92 to 110 Lbf-in (10.4 to 12.4 N•m).

note.para: The third hex bolt (Item 7) is not visible in Figure 90, it is accessible before the wiper motor pivot arm (Item 4) is installed.

step1.para: Install one flat washer (Item 5) and wiper linkage (Item 3) onto pivot post of wiper motor pivot arm (Item 4), then install second flat washer (Item 5) and E-Clip retainer (Item 2) securing wiper linkage to wiper motor pivot arm.

Position wiper motor pivot arm (Item 4) over motor shaft, before pressing wiper motor pivot arm onto motor shaft, align the wiper linkage (Item 3) and the wiper motor pivot arm so that they are straight in line with each other and press the wiper motor pivot arm onto the spline of motor shaft.
Install hex lock nut (Item 6) securing wiper motor pivot arm to motor shaft. Tighten hex lock nut to 180 to 220 Lbf-in (20.3 to 24.9 N•m).

svcsubproc.title: Install Wiper Motor with Electrical Connector part of Pig-Tail Wiring Harness on Vehicles with 2002 Engines after January 2005
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 91 for Items in parentheses.

note.para: Before installing the windshield wiper motor (Item 7) onto the windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 8) make sure it is in the "PARKED" or "OFF" position.

step1.para: Place windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) on a clean, dry work surface.

If the windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 8) is being replaced, install it back onto windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly mounting bracket (Item 9) of windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) and install two hex flanged head bolts (Item 6) through windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly mounting bracket (Item 9) into windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 8) weld nuts. Tighten hex flanged head bolts to 92 to 110 Lbf-in (10.4 to 12.4 N•m).

Position windshield wiper motor (Item 7) onto windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 8) and install top two hex flanged head bolts (Item 5) through windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly mounting bracket (Item 9) and windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 8) into windshield wiper motor. Then install one hex flanged head bolt (Item 5) through windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 8) into windshield wiper motor. Tighten hex flanged head bolts to 92 to 110 Lbf-in (10.4 to 12.4 N•m).

Position wiper motor pivot arm (Item 3) with wiper linkage (Item 4) over motor shaft, before pressing wiper motor pivot arm onto motor shaft, align the wiper linkage and the wiper motor pivot arm so that they are straight in line with each other and press the wiper motor pivot arm onto the spline of motor shaft.
Install hex flanged lock nut (Item 2) securing wiper motor pivot arm (Item 3) to motor shaft. Tighten hex flanged lock nut to 180 to 220 Lbf-in (20.3 to 24.9 N•m).

svcsubproc.title: Install Wiper Motor with Electrical Connector as part of Wiper Motor on Vehicles with 2002 Engines after January 2005
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 92 for Items in parentheses.

note.para: Before installing the windshield wiper motor (Item 5) onto the windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly mounting bracket (Item 6) make sure it is in the "PARKED" or "OFF" position.

step1.para: Place windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) on a clean, dry work surface.

Position windshield wiper motor (Item 5) onto windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly mounting bracket (Item 6) and install four hex flanged head bolts (Item 4) through windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly mounting bracket (Item 6) into windshield wiper motor (Item 5). Tighten hex flanged head bolts to 92 to 110 Lbf-in (10.4 to 12.4 N•m).

note.para: Before installing socket of wiper linkage (Item 3) onto pivot ball of wiper motor pivot arm (Item 2), it is recommended that a new weather seal be placed into the socket of wiper linkage.

step1.para: Position socket of wiper linkage (Item 3) with new weather seal over pivot ball of wiper motor pivot arm (Item 2) and press the socket of wiper linkage onto pivot ball of wiper motor pivot arm until it snaps into place.
